Description: Requesting to order goods for the warehouse
Answer: Login in to receipt using credentials provided by your organisation and in work select the order goods and fill the order form with necessary stock list.

Description: Inquiry about receiving goods into the warehouse
Example Utterance: Can you help me with GRN
Answer: Login in to receipt using credentials provided by your organisation and in work select the GRN, Enter the PO to get the order details and Approve the required order.

Description: Request to allocate received goods to their designated storage locations
Answer: Assign the works to associate using Putaway unit and If location capacity is not meeted ask Inventory for new location.

Description: Inquiry or instruction regarding dispatching orders to customers or other destinations
Answer: Enter the PO to get the order details and do dispatch.

Description: Requesting to update inventory records (e.g., adjustments, transfers)
Example Utterance: I need to update the inventory count.
Answer: Navigate to Manage inventory and edit the quantity as required.
